name: Burr Battle
text:
Had a fun time. The actors did a really good job. But, the food was very disappointing. My green bean  were so dried out and shriveled that they were extremely chewy. My wife’s Blacken Fish was anything but. That’s why I gave it 3 out of 5. The dinner is half of the experience.
It won’t be out last visit and I still recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you Burr for sharing your experience.  We have already address your concerns with our venue partners and we take your comments very seriously.  Please accept my apology for your experience.

name: kay cronk
text: This was such a disappointment. The acting was pitiful they tried humor. Nothing funny. I had been to one before that was professionally done. Fantastic.  Serious and thrilling.  This pitiful attempt was not even worth mentioning.  The food was awful  tablespoon of cold mash potatoes with 6 green beans and rubber chicken. The service was the highlight of the highlight of the evening great staff. Waste of time and money

resp.text: Oh no!  We're very sorry the show didn't exceed your expectation.  We will address the food situation your mentioned immediate.  We take customer reviews very serious.  Thank you so much for coming out and giving us a shot.  We understand we are not for every.

name: Tabitha Saveall
text: The actors were hilarious and very entertaining! Audience participation was equally entertaining. We enjoyed the people we sat with and talked with. I would absolutely recommend doing this

resp.text: Awesome!  You made our day Tabitha, thank you so much!

name: Michele W
text: I'm always looking for fun experiences and things to do other than just the typical, boring going out to eat.  I've also always wanted to try a Murder Mystery type dinner.  This event was awesome!  It was filled with mystery and comedy.  I really liked how the actors/actresses got everyone involved.  The food was surprisingly good (I was going for the show not so much the food so expected average).  The props and setup was perfect and entertaining.  Even the check-in desk was decorative.  I think this would be a perfect type of event for a date, co-workers and friends just wanting to hang out, since tables are shared, you can even come alone and fit right in.  I am writing this review at home after the event, during my experience we were not asked, or given incentives for writing a review.  Highly recommended for something to do out of the everyday ho-hum!

resp.text: Wow, awesome!  Thank you so much Michele.  We really appreciate you coming out and sharing your experience, it means the world to us.

name: Chris Word
text: Great Show. Funniest adventure. Adult humor kept me laughing. Food was phenomenal. Will definitely be back

resp.text: Wow, thank you so much Chris!

name: John Fadimiroye
text: Food was great, acting was on point, and the event really delivered on what they said they would do. Would definitely like to come back for another event.

resp.text: Outstanding!  Thank you so much John, we really appreciate the feedback! Thanks for coming out.

name: Virginia Boatwright
text: This show is so fun and entertaining! I recommend it to everyone!

resp.text: Wonderful, thank you Virginia.

name: Terri Alexander
text: The show is always fun and entertaining and I did so much better on solving the mystery.  Outstanding!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Terri for sharing your review.  We really appreciate it!

name: Katie Womack
text: Worth the money! The show is so funny! The food is good too!

resp.text: Love it!  Thank you Katie.

name: Leah Livingston
text:
Excellent show...
Highly recommend,  food awesome

resp.text: You Rock Leah!  Thank you so much for the review.

name: Christa McCrorie
text: Great show, good food!

resp.text: Fantastic!  You made our day Christa, thank you so much for sharing your experience!

name: Richie Green
text: I was so excited about this event after reading all of the excellent reviews. However, until I went to the event did I realize that all of these reviews that I read came by the company as they encouraged you to write a 5 star review midway through their performance by giving you a shot glass while there. The performance was decent. The food was ok. I enjoyed the cheese dip and salad, the main entree was not good, I had eggplant my husband had the fish. Overall, It was disappointing and overpriced. In fact, I was ready to leave way before it ended. I would not go again.

resp.text:
Hello Richie,
We hate that you had less than a wonderful time. We have never asked a guest to give us a 5 star review. But we do encourage reviews. We understand our shows not for everyone. Thank you for giving us a try!

name: Melton Fam
text: Food was excellent and staff At hotel was remarkable!! Such a fun and unique experience! It’s a must try!

resp.text: So cool, thank you so much, Melton, for the five star love.  We're humbled and grateful!  See ya next time.

name: Todd Varwig
text: A lot of fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much Todd!

name: Andrenette Gaines
text: Very fun,  would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Andrenette, you made our night!

name: Kian Threadgill
text: The dinner detective mystery was awesome! The food was delicious but most importantly the show itself was a hit. Well put together. Well planned. Overall delightful event.

resp.text: Outstanding!  Thank you so much for coming to the show and sharing your feedback!  We really appreciated it!

name: India Lattimore
text: My love enjoyed this so much

resp.text: Wonderful!  Thank you so much for coming out and sharing your experience!

name: Benjamin Bylsma
text: Great way to spend a night. Full of fun and excitement. A chance to mingle with new people and lots of laughs. Highly recommended for anyone.

resp.text: Wonderful! Thank you so much for coming out and sharing your experience!

name: Heather Duncan
text: I loved it!  For the price of movie tickets and concession food, you can have a four course meal with a 3 1/2 hour show!  The interactive nature of the show makes for a hysterical night, so be ready to be involved.  The actors are so great...I didn’t even know there was one at my table until it was too late! Give it a shot, and you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks Heather for your review!  Glad you had a KILLER night!

name: Famous Hutchison
text: Was a great show! The actors was so great and funny! They really do a great job interacting with people! I loved the food! Definitely will tell family and friends they need to go!

resp.text: Score!!!  Thank you so much for coming out and sharing your experience!

name: Burthia Booker
text: Very funny and amusing. I had a good time. Food definitely could have been better for the price, but the performers were great. FYI...the chicken was relatively bland and the fish was too spicy (hot)....hope that helps!

resp.text: That does help!  Thank you Burthia, we are always thriving to improve.  Glad you really enjoyed the show.

name: Heather Hyde
text: Came for birthday party and it was so fun! The show is funny and engaging. The food is pretty good. I got the fish which was fairly good and a little spicy. Would come back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for spending the night with us Heather!  We really appreciate it.

name: Justin S.
text: Great experience! The show was hilarious and riveting. The food and service were amazing. We’re definitely bringing a group back next time!

resp.text: Wonderful!  Thank you so much for coming out and sharing your experience.

name: John Caballero
text: The show was very entertaining and the environment made, even a couple on introverts like us open up and goof around with our fellow guests. The food was very flavorful and the mystery was challenging.

resp.text: Outstanding!  Thank you so much John for coming out and sharing your experience.

name: Annaleigh Holloway
text: Freaking awesome yall! Parking is easy, and the venue is beautiful. The show itself is insanely funny, and that is coming from someone who can't take a joke😂 The actors are nice, and very talented! I gave the actors a tip as a reward for being so much fun. The food is alright, I really enjoyed the pasta I had. Overall, it was a great experience

resp.text: Thank you Annaleigh for sharing your experience!

name: Destiny Woods
text: Everything was great except the food. The chicken was undercooked and the rice was overcooked. The actors were great and the show was hilarious. Definitely recommend but please improve on the food.

resp.text: Hello Destiny, thank you so much for coming to the show and sharing your feedback.  We will address this with the venue immediately.  Please accept our apologies on your experience of the food.  We are always striving to improve

name: ER J
text: I went to this for a birthday party and it was on of the best and funniest times of my life. 10/10, would to again.

resp.text: Sweet!! Thank you for coming out and sharing your experience!

name: Mavic Mike
text: Had one of the best times ever!! Great food, people and show!! A “ You must do, 2020!”

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming and sharing your experience!

name: Telicia Gayden
text: The show was great and very interactive! I would definitely recommend to friends and family!

resp.text: Wonderful!  Thank you so much for coming and sharing your experience!

name: Amber Nelson
text: Such a fun experience! The actors kept us laughing, the food was good, and it kept us thinking!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We're glad you came out!

name: Marsha Howell
text: Me and my husband went to the show on December 2nd. It was the best show ever! I absolutely loved it. I have told many of my family and friends about it! I really want to go back when there is a new show. The cast was great! They make it so much fun! I highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience and the referral to friends and family!

name: Mishaella Ryans
text: So much fun! Really enjoyed this show.

resp.text: Awesome!  Thank you so much for coming!

name: candra pyles
text: Very Entertaining! Food was ok.

resp.text: Awesome.  Thank you for coming out!

name: Hope Kicklighter
text: So. FUN. And the food was really good too!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We really appreciate the support!

name: LeAnne Mackey
text: Was fun!  I liked that we were all involved. Lots of laughs. Will come again!!!!!

resp.text: Awesome!  Thank you so much for coming and sharing your experience!

name: Josh
text: Great show. Hilarious script.

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We really appreciate the support!

name: Brandon V
text: Amazing! Was blown away with the interactive display! Great cast!

resp.text: YES!!  Thank you so much for coming out and sharing your experience.

name: Josh Lovett
text: Awesome show! Great event!

resp.text: Fantastic!  Thank you so much, Josh, for coming to the show and sharing your experience.

name: Catherine Angelo
text: Very fun night and great food!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We really appreciate the support!

name: Maria Schulte
text: So much fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming and sharing your experience!

name: Richard Finke
text: Amazing and fun

resp.text: Thank you very much for the review Richard.  We're delighted you had a great time!

name: Cathie Bella
text: Show was good, food meh

resp.text: Thank you Cathie, we are alway striving to improve the food and experience.

name: Locutus Borg
text: So much fun!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your night with us!  We really appreciate it!

name: tina hJELM
text: We had the best time!! Food was awesome! Acting was great!

name: Julia G.
text: It was my first time at this kind of event.  I didn't know what to expect.  Nine tables, ten people each table.  The people at our table were interesting and very nice.  I took my daughter, everyone else were in couples.  Story line was well rehearsed.  There was still something lacking.  It was fun enough.  I would go back when they change the story line.

name: Brittani Horton
text: Great staff, funny actors. Really enjoyed myself.

name: Teresa Chase
text: Good show. Food was great.

name: Sasha Arnold
text: It was an amazing show! Great cast and awesome food!

name: KaleiAloha
text: This was the most fun! Exciting experience I’ve had in so long! I want to do this so much more: and I will be telling everyone about this!!! Will 💯 percent recommend!

name: Steve Goldstein
text: Lots of fun. Recommended for anyone 12 and up

name: Tracy Brock
text: Very entertaining, funny, and  thrilling.

name: Erica Brock
text: Super fun with great food!

name: Monique Speights
text: Food and acting was amazing!!!! It was very interactive and the show kept my attention!!!

name: Graysen Jones
text: It was an awesome experience. 100% would recommend it to anyone.

name: Rachel Farmer
text: Lots of laughs, great food, great actors. Would definitely come again and recommend.

name: Robbie Christmas
text: Wow. Amazing! We put this together for my girlfriend's birthday and it couldn't have gone any better. I loved everything about this. My girlfriend and the rest of us were literally giggling the whole time. Brandon is your guy you need as your host. He was fun, in character and patient. We truly had an amazing time. We will definitely be signing up for their future  mysteries.

name: Erica Pollock
text: Had a surprise birthday party! Case was very interactive and created a cleaver and fun storyline! If you like solving mysteries and want to have a great time with friends, I would highly recommend!  A Great way to have a birthday party that was safe and virtual.

name: S M
text: This was so so fun!!! There were lots of creative clues and the process really draws you in - even for shy or nervous folks, you get lots of information and support along the way to participate without feeling overwhelmed. It's so well designed. If you're wondering if you should do this, definitely hesitate no longer. You'll have a blast. I definitely recommend Brandon if you want to request someone in particular to lead - he was so much fun and really made the experience special and personalized!

name: Natalie
text: Detective Tom hosted my birthday zoom murder mystery. He was great at wrangling 12 drinking, snarky friends through the murder mystery and his persona was a ton of fun. We had such a great time that he graciously left zoom up for an hour afterward so our friend group could continue with the laughter and fun for a bit longer. The next day, we felt like we had been at an awesome party the night before even though none of us left our homes. This was such a unique quarantine experience.

name: Nick Dynin
text: Absolutely amazing time! Troy Murray absolutely killed it - his comedic timing, poise (we were VERY late), and audience involvement was second to none. Looking forward to trying out all of the other murder mysteries!!

name: amber Howen
text: Thank you very much for an Awesome murder mystery game. Having my family be able to have a get together, and have a ton of fun was great. Our Detective Ness host was a ton of fun! I would recommend them for any function. Thanks again!

name: Chris Fulton
text: Our team had a virtual murder mystery event.  It was very well played, entertaining and fun!  We had a great time and it was well worth the time invested.

name: Melissa Willman
text: Had an awesome time on our Zoom Murder Mystery with Jade.  She was an awesome host.  The company had everything planned out perfectly and the communication was amazing.  All of our guests were able to participate with ease and everyone had a great time.  If you're considering this, do it!

name: Martina Kopel
text: The Murder Mystery was Great! I was very nervous being Charity Case but Detective Ness helped me through it. Troy was Great. He made me feel confident. Our family is up for all the Mysteries. Thank you all who made my Christmas Present so much fun.

name: Tam Kenon
text: This was so much fun!!! I love the way you guys put this together as a virtual event. It flowed really well and Detective P. Ness did a great job guiding us as characters.

name: Vineet Kuroodi
text: Allison was awesome! She walked us through everything while staying in character the whole time! This was a really fun and covid-friendly work activity, but I can see myself playing again with friends and family.

name: Erin Mayhood
text: Jade created a fabulous experience for our family. A perfect event to bring our family together over zoom. We had kids involved (age 11 and up) and grandparents and everybody participated and had an amazing time!

name: Frances D
text: So much fun with Detective Ness/Katie! We used this as a birthday celebration for family distributed across the country and everything worked great. Best Zoom party ever!

name: Edward Kopel
text: Very fun and engaging.  The host was patient and helpful and led with humor to bring all participants into the flow of the game.  It was a challenge to decipher the clues and solve the mystery, but fun all the same.

name: Pauline “Plinerd” D
text: Renee Maria was great. We had a couple times where we needed to catch up on info and she seamlessly filled the time. Instructions were clear, enough information was given to make the crime something you could actually solve, multiple types of media (reading, videos, Zoom) kept things shakin'. Considering doing this for teen's birthday remote party. Thank you so much for a great first experience!

name: elizabeth george
text: Renee Maria did an amazing job at the murder mystery night. I had so much fun trying to solve a murder I felt like a true detective and would DEFINITELY do it again! I would like to try the Harry Potter themed one and all of then please!! I solved the murder and felt like a pro detective. Sadly I did not win best dressed but I played Irma Gerd and dressed up it was a blast! Thank you Renee Maria for making it feel so real and fun her acting was on point. I don't know who the conductor was because he left early on but he had hilarious jokes and puns at the beginning too it was cool.

name: Steve MacKessy
text: Tom was great   A really fantastic time. It was well organized and a lot of fun. A great pandemic activity.

name: Kevin Jacobsen
text: Tons of fun!  The host did a great job staying in character and getting everyone involved.  Looking forward to the next one!

name: Claudia Jordan
text: What a fun night! Renee Maria was our detective and gave us a great and memorable experience! Highly recommend!

name: Hannah Smith
text: My workplace did a virtual Zoom murder mystery and it was a blast. Case was our detective and did a phenomenal job. Definitely would recommend.

name: rachel livingston
text: This was so much fun!  Our detective was fantastic and moved everything along wonderfully!  I recommend!

name: Robin Smith
text: Our murder mystery was so fun and our host was so patient!! Loved it all. Would do again

name: Vanessa Layne
text: Great experience.  We had a blast.  Please make more! We've done them all!

name: Pat Sprehe
text: We did a Murder Mystery via Zoom (late COVID) as a company social event.  We did the Polar Express (in April; go figure) got Eric and it was a really great time.

name: Alex Bachari
text: Danielle was super fun. Great time. Make sure you get a group with people who are down to dress up and be silly.

name: Keith McBain
text:
Detective Perry kept this night of murder and mystery entertaining and fun!
Thank you for keeping the night on track to solve the crime!
It was a blast!

name: Wyatt Kincaid
text: Super fun! Detective Perry did a great job and made the experience very interactive.

name: Hunter Via
text: Great night! So much fun to be with our friends again and our host made it a lot of fun!

name: Shawna Garcia
text: We had a blast! Felicia was a terrific host and this was a great team building event

name: Sarah Fuller
text: Detective Tom was fantastic and made the evening super fun. I loved it!

name: Matt Gavitt
text: Alison and Lucy were great, we did this as a birthday party for my daughter and we all had fun dressing up and getting into character

name: Emily Rice
text: A great company! Rebecca did great as Detective Ness, and it was a great time!

name: Christine Serio-Shively
text: We had such a blast! Eric--the detective--did an awesome job and it was all so much fun to role playing and trying to figure out a murder mystery!

name: Amanda Christensen
text: Our hostess was fabulous! We all had a blast - highly recommend.

name: Emily Carlson
text: This was SO much fun! Honestly, it was such a break during quarantine. Definitely recommend.

name: Ryan Pellegrino
text: Troy Murray was fantastic - did a great job w/ our murder mystery

text: Christmas gift that we played with 8 person group, and had a lot of fun with our guide Troy Murray!

name: Stefanie Dion Jones

name: Sharon Berdeaux
text: MY CHURCH GROUP WENT TO SEE THE IRWIN BERLIN "I LOVE PIANO" AND IT WAS GREAT! GOOD FOOD, GREAT PEOPLE, AND THE MUSIC WAS VERY GOOD. WE ALL HAD A VERY GOOD TIME AND ARE PLANNING TO GO AGAIN FEBRUARY 28TH. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND GOING TO THE DINNER THEATRE IF YOU LOVE GOOD CLEAN FUN AND GOOD FOOD.

name: Stephanie Graeter
text: Sponsors of AISA Drama competition: love the location and Faulkner staff.😎

name: Renee Folk
text: We have been several times and have enjoyed the plays and the dinner.The food is good and wonderful talent

name: Matt Dickson
text: Can't beat the price for dinner and a show

name: Mary Frates
text: We had a pretty good time!!!!

name: David Hull
text: I had a wonderful time watching a play called, "fools."

name: Sheila Danhoff
text: We attended Brandon's magic show while we were visiting Gulf Shores for vacation.  It was a great break from all the outdoor activities.  And what a great show!  Brandon is a great entertainer and we are still trying to figure out how he pulled off some of his tricks!  Loved seeing his family at the end!

resp.text: Sheila, thank you for attending the magic show during your vacation and for your detailed review, it means a lot to us!

name: Derrick Piper
text: So much fun! Brandon is witty, funny, changes seamlessly between impersonations, and delivers punch lines on point! I can't believe how much fun this was and so cheap for the value! They let you bring in outside alcohol from other OWA vendors. They sell soda and snacks reasonably priced. Its a small theater so get tickets early, we definitely will be going back for the other shows he performs!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! I give you 5 stars for your laugh! :) We look forward to seeing you again next time!

name: Keith Ludwig
text: Awesome show!  Many impersonations were spot on and Brandon added his own quirks and humor to make them that much more enjoyable.  After the show he posed for pictures, chatted and gave a few magic tips also. Venue was very small, not a bad seat in the theater.

resp.text: Thank you for your thoughtful and detailed review, we're so glad you enjoyed the variety show and we hope you can come back to see another show sometime :)

name: Jeanette Clemens
text: We took mom to the Brandon Styles impressionist show and we were super impressed. Pun intended. You not the only one with jokes, Brandon.  We had a great time and were entertained from start to finish. We'll definitely go back for the magic show.

resp.text: Hey Jeanette, thank you for bringing your mom to the variety show and we're super happy you all had a great time. See you next time when you come back for the magic show, you better have some jokes for us!

name: Ray Lemon
text:
It's great to see such quality entertainment in this area. A nice family friendly show in a small, personal theater setting. Brandon could certainly hold his own in a much larger venue, but he chooses to do this to stay close to his family.
Dinner at Paula Dean's Restaurant and a Vegas  Style lounge variety show, equals a great "Date Night" and it's less than an hour from Pensacola or Mobile and quite affordable.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and great detailed review! We appreciate it :)

name: Candace Phillips
text: This show was great. My husband and I were so glad this was what we chose to do on a Saturday night. Most of the show was right up our alley but there was about 10 minutes or so at the end that we were wondering what happened. It was almost like he changed his target audience. I still wouldn’t have missed this. Excellent impersonating and great interaction with audience. Definitely dragging my teens to see the show soon.

resp.text: Candace, we're so glad you came to see the variety show and we look forward to having you and the teens back! :)

name: Tbaucom55@gmail.com Nana55
text: Enjoyable entertainment!  If your in Foley/Gulf Shores schedule this show.  Brandon Styles is a good entertainer, worth the money!

resp.text: Well thank you very much for the great feedback. We're glad you had a great time

name: Teri Reynolds
text: We took our kids and grandkids to the show this week. We all had a great time. The show is full of laughter and fun, and is great for all ages. Our grandson got up on stage, and got a big surprise, but I won't spoil it here. Reasonably priced for a fun night out!

resp.text: Teri, thank you for the 5 stars and bringing your grandson to the magic show! That surprise is one of our favorite parts of the show too, hahaa!!

name: Kendra Krout
text: We had a party of 6 for the show on Saturday. We honestly had no idea what to expect. We had the best time and laughed soooo much. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Hey Kendra, we're so glad you booked tickets to see the show and that you had a blast! See you next time :)

name: Sandy Shea
text: We saw the variety show Saturday night at OWA and were pleasantly surprised at how good it was.  Would love to see it again with friends! We are recommending this show to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We look forward to having you back for another show! :)

name: Summer McDade
text: IF YOU GET THE CHANCE TO GO, DEFINITELY GO! We have two kids (10,4 + boy, girl) They absolutely loved it. Us adults had a blast too! It was worth every penny and super inclusive. Everybody was so nice and welcoming and the show was AMAZING! We haven’t ever been to a magic show but my son loves it so we went and it did not disappoint. Brandon easily keeps you engaged and interacts freely with the audience. It truly was more than we anticipated and that’s a great thing.

resp.text: THANK YOU for such a wonderful review, it means a lot to us! We are so glad you got to see our Magic Show and that everyone loved it!

name: Cecil Perry
text: We are regular attendees to all of Brandon's shows.  He is a great entertainer and his 2021 variety show, if possible, is even better than the one in 2020.  Be sure and get the VIP option.  His up close and personal magic is amazing and if you're lucky, he may show you how he does one or two of his tricks, but not all of them!

resp.text: You guys rock! We love seeing you at like EVERY event! Thank you for your support, we're happy you have such a good time that you keep coming back :)

name: Miguel Knuckey
text: Brandon brings Great humor and impressions of the best artists known, his ability to keep the momentum of engagement is far beyond I’ve experienced coming from the stage of musical comedy. Will definitely return.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and positive review! Look forward to seeing you next time :)

name: miller malice
text: We absolutely loved this show… Family friendly, up beat and exciting.., kept audience involved… will be back!!!!! Y’all go see it

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to the Variety Show! We look forward to having you back for another show! :)

name: Amber Merrell
text: Took the family for the variety show on April 24th.  Brandon's impressions were funny.  The kids did not get into it as much not knowing the different artist but the few magic tricks he did throughout the show were fun.  I would suggest  this for adults but look forward to taking our boys to his magic show later on this year.

resp.text: Thank you! I'm so glad that overall you had a great time and will be coming back for the Magic Show. I promise the kids will LOVE it and so will the adults :)

name: Michael Scarbrough
text: My family and I saw the variety show. We absolutely loved it, I would highly recommend it. Cannot wait to see the magic show.

resp.text: Michael, thank you for the 5 star review and we love to hear your experience. Look forward to seeing you when you come back for the magic show!!

name: Jonathan Bennett
text: If your looking for entertainment, this guy is the best.  We had a great time with our whole family.  They are a family run business but literally the best in the world.  Brandon has placed top in the world and he is a true entertainer/magician/vocalist, true talent.

resp.text: Oh Jon, thank you for bringing your family to Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show (and all of our other shows). Thank you so much for your support and for your kind words!

name: Lisa Wiggins
text: The show was great! We carried 4 of our grandchildren & they absolutely LOVED it! Beginning to end was funny & very entertaining. Brandon is a very talented magician.

resp.text: Lisa, thank you so much for bringing your family to our magic show last night! We hope to see you next time you're on vacation :)

name: Donald Creppel
text: Enjoyed Brandon's Variety Show is was fun for all ages. Went with my wife and friends and done the VIP and Brandon showed us some close up slight of hand tricks. If you down on Alabama Gulf Coast and want something to take the whole family, come see Brandon Styles at OWA.

resp.text: Hey Donald, thank you for the awesome review and kind words! So glad you choose VIP, what a fun time it was :)

name: Michael Foster
text: This show had the entire audience laughing. I would say the show is equal parts magic, and comedy. Brandon is a goofball throughout, and he often solicits audience participation. I only wish the show was longer.

resp.text: Hey Michael, Thank you for coming to see the Comedy Magic Show, for your great review and kind words! We hope you get the chance to come back and see the Variety Show too :)

name: Joanna Saucier
text: What an amazing show! Brandon is extremely talented, entertaining & puts on a great show. Can’t wait to go back to see again.

resp.text: Hey Joanna, thank you for your positive review, we're glad you loved the Variety Show! See you again next time :)

name: Steven Walling
text: We have been to 3 shows at Brandon's theatre. He is always funny, entertaining, and involving the audience to interact. Highly recommend his variety show as well as his magic show. Good Times!!

resp.text: Thank you for your support, we're thankful you are enjoying the shows we produce at our theater! See you again :)

name: Linda Lucas
text: We truly enjoyed the show. Brandon performed a wide range of music so everyone was able to hear a favorite. Also the food was good and all of the staff were professional and friendly. I highly recommend going to this show. You will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Hey Linda, thank you so much for attending Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show and for your kind words! We're glad you enjoyed yourself!

name: Chad Taylor
text: It was a great show from the start to the end. Never a doll moment. Lol all night long. Great show can not wait to see the Magic show with the kids

resp.text: Hey Chad, so glad you all loved the variety show! Thank you for the great review, see you next time at the magic show!

name: Richard Anthony
text: Been twice now, both times a phenomenal performance. One of the greatest magicians, amazing show, and ultimately keeps you on the edge of your seat laughing!

resp.text: Awe, thank you for the kind words and feedback! See you next time :)

name: Lisa Kennedy
text: I have never been to a hypnosis show. I have only seen it on TV and was a skeptic until now, especially since one of my friends was on stage and clearly under hypnosis. Very good show and I definitely want to go again.

resp.text: I'm glad you came to one of our special events and had a great time. Hope to have the back for our other shows!

name: Macie Rodriguez
text: Great entertainment, especially for the kids. Good audience participation and good setting. Would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for bringing the family to the COMEDY MAGIC SHOW!! Glad you all had a good time :)

name: C “Sunshine” Thompson
text: Came to Brandon's  variety show when we were on vacation and it was awesome.  He does great on the impressions,  comedy, and dance.  I  absolutely love to dance so any thing with music and dance is spot on for me. We came back a few nights later for the magic show and it was good as well but my favorite is the  variety  show.   Good job Brandon.  I  recommend  seeing the show  when you are in the area.

resp.text: Thank you for seeing and recommending both the Magic Show and Variety Show while you were on vacation!

name: Raley & Tenley Mc
text: Great show!  Unexpected and the high light of our spring break trip! I would highly recommend his shows for any age, prepare to laugh the entire time!

resp.text: Awesome! We're so happy you came to our show during your spring break vacation and that it was a highlight!! That means a lot, thanks!

name: Kim Crawley
text: This show was amazing. He voice interpretations are so spot on. He was hilarious. Enjoyed it immensely.

resp.text: Thank you!! Hope to see you again next time

name: Hearher Elliott
text: It was absolutely wonderful! We thoroughly enjoyed the experience, Brandon is a ball of energy and kept the room alive. We will be back to see more of what they have to offer. Before our night came to an end we payed a visit to the magic shop. The thumb lights are still a huge hit in our home. Thank you so much for entertaining us on our Date-Night!!

resp.text: Heather, thank you for spending date night at our show and for your kind words! Keep your magic up and we look forward to having you back!

name: Pat Coffin
text: Really great show, Brandon is very talented! Loved all the characters he brought to the stage.

resp.text: Hey Pat, thank you for coming to see the Variety Show! We're glad you had a great time with us :)

name: Tim O'Hara
text: Fun, lighthearted, clean comedy and family friendly, outstanding impersonations! Great entertainment!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to the Variety Show and leaving a 5 star review!

name: Cyndi G.
text: Brandon's performance was hilarious and gifted. He kept me on the edge of my seat 🤣😂 with laughter. I love the impressions and magic.  He has mad skills. My entire group of six enjoyed it in its entirety. I love the fact that he and his wife  work so well together to bring great entertainment.  We are going back in three days for another show.  Yay!🙌🏽

resp.text: We're so glad you had a fantastic time at the Variety Show, so much that you came back a few days later to watch the Magic Show too! Thank you for the support, our family works hard to make sure you have a good time so thank you for noticing :)

name: MICHELLEG
text: The show was great!  Brandon Styles has a great voice and is halarious!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: JoAnn Malmberg
text: We thoroughly, thoroughly enjoyed  this performance. Amazed at his talent. Highly recommend seeing Brandon perform.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see the last Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show for this year! We rocked out. I hope you get the chance to see our other shows that run the rest of the year.

name: Brittany Etheridge
text: Seriously one of the best nights ever! Brandon is so talented. The kids (ages 7, 4, 3 and 0) were entertained the entire show. It was absolutely hilarious. Perfect for family night, date night, any night. Would go.... Will go over and over!

resp.text: We're so glad your family had a great time at Brandon Styles Variety Show and We can't wait to see you again!

name: Tammy Conway
text: This Show is the most Awesome,  I love the jokes and the singing in different voices. I have been several times and we are planning to go to the upcoming dinner show in January or February,  To know that his Family all contributes to the running of the show is wonderful and makes you want to support them even more, Thank you for a great show.. Definitely recommend.....

resp.text: Tammy, THANK YOU for being a FAN and always coming to see our shows, your support means a lot to us! We look forward to seeing you again this winter!

name: Lisa Durham
text: The best hour of fun in the area! I live in Gulf Shores and have seen BS several times. My favorite parts of the show - the presidents doing magic, the short magic show in the middle, how he nails unique voices like Aaron Neville and Satchmo, Obama rapping, and the dancing. But, the whole show is fun and very entertaining! Brandon and Diamond produce a lively, delightful time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful detailed review and coming to see our shows over and over! It really means a lot to us!

name: Scott Pickett
text: We really enjoyed our night at the Brandon Styles magic show. My son even got onstage and was part of the act! I highly recommend this show to anyone in the Gulf Shores area!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving this wonderful review! It means a lot to us! We are so glad you had a great time :)

name: Missy Tyler
text: Best Date Night!!! John and I were thoroughly entertained by another fantastic show by Brandon Styles:). We laughed so hard, and were again amazed by Brandon’s talent, creativity, and energy. Best of all, you can tell Brandon is enjoying himself as much as his guests are. This was the 5th time we have seen him (he has a variety of shows). It’s always a good time. Having Brandon Styles on Alabama’s Gulf Coast is such a gift. We highly recommend his shows to the guests who stay in our vacation rental. Good times!

resp.text: This means so much to us! Thank you for your continued support and allowing us to entertain you OVER & OVER! ♥♥♥

name: Kathy Guerrero
text: His show is awesome had us laughing the whole time wish it was longer

resp.text: So glad you were laughing the whole time. I sometimes wish it was longer too but it's exhausting acting that "crazy" on stage lol

name: C Berk
text: So much fun!  Two adults (late 30s, early 40s) and 3 kids (9, 11, 14) attended and we all had fun.  Great mixture of impressions and magic and dancing - super fun!  We ALL laughed so hard.  The two youngest didn’t know many of the songs but they still enjoyed his energy and the magic tricks.  We would recommend this show for all ages!  So glad we booked this show and would go to another one in a heartbeat if we had more time.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing the family to the Variety Show! I'm so happy that everyone had a good time!

name: Melissa Chisolm
text: This was such a great time! We had a lot of fun and Brandon was so interactive with us adults and our kid!

resp.text: Thank you for bringing your family to the Private Close-Up Magic Show! We're glad everyone had a great time :)

name: Lorri McDaniel
text: The show was great. The only complaint is the drunk on the 2nd row vomiting and ruining the atmosphere.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed GULF COAST COMEDY FEST - STAND UP COMEDY NIGHT! I'm so sorry that happened, it definitely was a first and hopefully last. We hope to see you back at one of our other shows

name: ronnie butts
text:
Great show food was great
This is a show you would not want to miss well worth the time

resp.text: Hey Ronnie, we appreciate you leaving 5 stars! We're glad you had a great time at Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show!

name: Sherri DeJong
text:
We had an absolute blast!!!! My husband an daughter were called upon stage for a magic trick. That was awesome, an the trick was awesome! Still can not figure that one out👀. Brandon an his family are genuinely sweet people, kid friendly show.
We bought VIP backstage pretty 😎 cool. Oh an I was serenaded by Elvis, and I’m all shook up!!!

resp.text:
Thank you for choosing VIP and letting Elvis serenade you BUT was it really Elvis, was it Andy Coffman or was it Brandon Styles? lol
We wish the best for your daughter as she finishes her school year!

name: Babbette Rask
text: Awesome / we look forward to seeing his other shows / he also has a lovely family❤️.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see TRIP DOWN MEMORY LANE Dinner Show and for your kind words. We're glad you had an awesome time and look forward to having you back for another show :)

name: Monica Johnson
text: Funny, entertaining show with amazing magic tricks. Kept the audience laughing with his impersonations. Very talented entertainer. Can't wait to see the new 2021 shows!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars, it means a lot! We are glad you enjoyed the show and we look forward to having you back for Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show and 2021s NEW Variety Show!

name: Jimmey Ewing
text: We had such a good time at his show last night. He s hilarious and made us feel extremely comfortable and welcomed. I hope to be able to return and go to his show again sometime.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind remarks and for leaving 5 stars, it means a lot! We hope you get to come back and see another show again too :)

name: Kaleigh Holmes
text: Brandon...or The Great Brandini as he is sometimes referred to, is great! So many tricks that will leave you scratching your head. Pack a tissue or two because you’ll need one for sure..from laughing so hard you’ll cry! The staff is awesome, too. All around great time. Great entertainment for the entire family.

resp.text: Hahaa, Brandini is a highlight to the Magic Show, that's for sure. Thank you so much for bringing your family to our show!

name: Kim Main
text: My friend and I went to see the variety show and had a blast. Brandon is very talented and knocked it out of the park with his impersonations ! . He even goes around after the show for a meet and greet and pics if desired. Can't wait to go back and catch his magic show !

resp.text: Hey Kim, thank you <3

name: Rhonda Parker
text: A top notch show! A Las Vegas show brought to  Alabama! Brandon is very entertaining and incorporates the audience into the show which makes for one BIG happy family and show! Would definitely recommend this show to all ages! We will return Brandon! And his wife Diamond and their daughter complete their family enterprise!!! 👏👏

resp.text: Rhonda, thank you for your support and this beautiful review, it means a lot! We'll see you next time.

name: Jesse Farnsworth
text: Great show good to get out and do something different.  I was on vacation and wanted to take my kids somewhere but with the pandemic not much available.  So glad I found  this show.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We're glad you bring the family to see our show :)

name: Drew Baggett
text: Great show we took our son and he loved it as much as us! Very funny, entertaining and very good with close-up magic!!! We will be going back to see his other shows for sure

resp.text: Awe, thank you so much! We're glad the whole family had a great time! We'll see you next time :)

name: Victoria Best
text: So fun and funny!! We took my 10 year old nephew and 4 year old niece.. and they both loved it! We also loved the show. We will definitely have to check out his other shows the next time we come to OWA.

resp.text: We're so glad everyone loved the show! Thank you for the ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and we'll see you next time 😊

name: Lynn Brown
text: Brandon can do it all! Very entertaining and enjoyable show!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars and leaving a review! Glad you had fun :)

name: Tayler Zamora
text: This was such a fun way to spend the evening! The show was packed full of magic, impressions & comedy. I didn’t stop laughing/smiling for the full hour! Highly recommend checking it out.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this wonderful review and recommending Brandon Styles Variety Show, it means a lot!

name: Christopher Faul
text: This guy is simply AMAZING!! Drove 400 miles to see the show. Was not disappointed. This is an absolute MUST SEE! Down to Earth guy, great magician, and great impressionist. Will definitely be back to see him again! Thanks Brandon for making our vacation a memorable one.

resp.text: Wow, 400 miles! We're so happy we made your vacation memorable and we do look forward to having you back! Thank you so much for leaving such an awesome 5-STAR review!

name: Frank Hunter
text: We had a great time.... dinner at Trattoria and then an AMAZING magic show by Brandon Styles... OWA is a perfect venue for dinner and a show...

resp.text: Hey Frank, thanks for spending your evening at OWA and attending our show!

name: Pat Cox
text: Best show ever! Brandon is so talented I recommend it highly.

resp.text: Pat, thank you so much for attending Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show and for your kind words! We're glad you enjoyed yourself!

name: Michael Kircher
text: Loved this show!!  Brandon's impressions were terrific!!  His magic tricks were lots of fun too.  Could have easily stayed longer for even more entertainment.  Highly recommend the show!!

resp.text: Thank you, Michael! We're glad you had a great time and we hope you get to come back and see another one of our shows sometime!!

name: Mary Daza
text: Best show I’ve been to in a long time. Magic is super legit, he is hilarious, and the crowd involvement is amazing. So much fun. Will definitely be back for another show very soon.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to the Magic Show, I'm glad you had a great time and we look forward to having you back for another one of our shows. Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show runs in Jan & Feb and the Variety Show is every Tuesday & Saturday, March- December!!

name: Phyllis Jones
text: I really enjoyed the show!!!  Brandon is a good impressionist; very funny!  I like how it's a family affair when it comes to running the place.  Enjoyable entertainment!

resp.text: Thank you for recognizing that, we do our best to make sure your family has an unforgettable time!

name: Jean Lorance
text: Brandon is extremely talented. He has the voice, moves and even facial expressions of a wide variety of celebrities. The whole family was intrigued and entertained. Our 15 year old niece was called up to assist Brandon with one of the acts. There is no way Brandon could have known that she has had a very hard year full of endless struggles, heartbreaks and hardships. The worst of which, she has been diagnosed with an incurable kidney disease, IGA Neuropathy.  That night Brandon made her a star!!  She had a genuine smile. Thank you

resp.text: AWE! Thanks for bringing your family to Brandon Styles Variety Show. I'm honored to have had the opportunity to make her feel so special! Prayers for your niece! Come back and see us next time you come to Gulf Shores!

name: Lucy Mounteer-Vasko
text: Brandon was so funny and did an amazing job at making us laugh.  We enjoyed it so much that we will go back. Thank you

resp.text: That's awesome, we look forward to having you back for another show! Thank you for the 5 stars!!

name: brettrobinsonrentals
text: EXCELLENT SHOW!!  5 STARS!! (and a delicious dinner).

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! So glad you loved the Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show!

name: Beachball Properties
text: Brandon Style’s Variety Show was incredible. Amazing impressions, humor along the way, and a little bit of magic! We recommend all visitors to the area check out this 5 ⭐️ Show!

resp.text: Hey Beachball Properties!! Thank you so much for coming to see one of our shows and for leaving 5 stars!! We appreciate you!

name: diana durling
text: Everyone was polite & friendly. Loved the show very upbeat &  funny at times, great impressions.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see Brandon Styles Variety Show, we're glad you had a good experience with us and we hope you come back to see Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show!

name: Grace Anne Blake
text: Such a fantastic show... we did a couples night, we laughed we danced we sang along!!! So much fun!!

resp.text: We're glad you had a great date night! Thank you so much for the 5 star review!

name: stephanie rabalais
text: This is a must see when visiting Orange Beach/Gulf Shore! Very entertaining and fun! Brandon is very talented!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we appreciate you recommending the shows!

name: Nathan Kidwell
text: Been to see 2 of his shows so far.  Both have been an amazingly great time!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: Heather Gillespie
text: The Brandon Styles show was amazing!  It is a great show for the family or a great date night out. I was very impressed.

resp.text: Heather, thank you for bringing your family to the Variety Show! We are so glad you had a good time and we hope you can come back and see another one of our family friendly shows sometime!!

name: Carol Furman
text: My daughter and grandkids came to visit from Seattle and we took them to the Brandon Styles Show. Everyone loved it; he’s  so funny and entertaining. We’ve been 2 or 3 times previously and highly recommend this show.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars and for coming back to see our shows, it means a lot to us! We're so glad you have a good time each time! :)

name: Mike Hough
text: This show was FABULOUS, a definite must see. Be prepared to laugh for the length of the show. Great for the whole family. With lots of audience participation.

resp.text: Thank you for this amazing review and the 5 stars!! I'm glad everyone enjoyed and laughed a lot!! That's my goal :)

name: MK Chapman (SacredRockStars)
text: Excellent attraction! Fun for the entire family! Better than expected! We had a blast and the entire staff was so friendly. The Entertainment District the show is performed at is called Owa and that is also a neat little downtown marketplace with great shops and an amusement park where there are no lines! We highly recommend Brandon’s show! Make sure to levitate it’s a hoot!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the amazing review! It means a lot to us. We're so glad you decided to spend your evening with us and that your had a great time :)

name: Mary Lynn
text: Great show as usual.  You don’t want to miss this one!  Must see.

resp.text: Thank you for coming back and recommending Brandon Styles Variety Show!

name: Kimberley Daugherty
text: This show is totally a must see!! Entertaining from start to finish. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for recommending our Variety Show, we're glad you had a great time with us! We hope to have you back for the Magic Show or Dinner Show sometime.

name: Mary Lynn
text: Great show as usual.  You don’t want to miss this one!  Must see.

resp.text: Thank you for coming back and recommending Brandon Styles Variety Show!

name: Lyn Conner
text: I was disappointed because he didn’t say who he was impersonating ; therefore I was unable to recognize most. I was not impressed. So sorry it was not as I expected.

resp.text: I'm sorry you were disappointed but Brandon actually does introduce almost ever artist he performs. The songs he selected for this variety show were all once on the top 20 music charts, he does this so that even if you don't know the artist, more than likely you'll have heard the song. We hope you enjoyed the comedy, magic and adlib. Maybe you will enjoy another one of our shows, Trip Down Memory Lane is a dinner show with music from 1950-1970. Thank you for your feedback.

name: David LeBoeuf
text: The show was very entertaining & a great way to spend an evening. I do recommend this show.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars!

name: Kimberley Daugherty
text: This show is totally a must see!! Entertaining from start to finish. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for recommending our Variety Show, we're glad you had a great time with us! We hope to have you back for the Magic Show or Dinner Show sometime.

name: angie jackson
text: Brandon is talented and funny! This was so worth it. Can’t wait to see him again.

resp.text: Thanks Angie! We look forward to seeing you again too :)

name: Jennifer Hartness
text: So glad the kids and I stumbled upon this show. We had a great time. We really enjoyed how genuine Mr Styles is. When he cracked up, we cracked up!  We also love knowing we are supporting a family business.  We will be back to see the rest of his shows!

resp.text: Hey Jennifer, thank you for supporting our family business by bringing your family to enjoy our shows! We look forward to seeing you when you come back!

name: Lydia Nelson
text: Amazing and super interactive. It was a nice small setting so you felt like it was very personal and seeing all the tricks up close was simply cool! Don't know how he did his trick with my husband and I on stage but was such a great time. Would recommend this for any one, children or not, it was great but very family friendly.  Love that the family stays together and works together, will definitely return for another show!!!  Loved his different changes in character!!!! Go Brandini 😀 God bless!

resp.text: Lydia, We're happy you liked the personal setting of the theater, the character changes and that you got to participate on stage. Thank you for this fantastic 5-STAR review, it means a lot to us and we look forward to having you back as well :)

name: Geno Jessmone
text: Good show but I wish their was a little more magic

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving 5 stars! We're glad you enjoyed the Variety Show tonight and if you love magic please come back and see the Magic Show another night! 1 full hour of magic ♥️

name: Jim Meyer
text: An outstanding performance by a truly gifted performer. Laughed, Clapped, and at times, awe-struck for 60 minutes of pure family entertainment. We liked it so much that we are bringing another grandchild next week. Will recommend this Show to all our friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving this wonderful review! It means a lot to us! We are so glad you had a great and will be coming back :)

name: darren torrence
text: Really enjoyed the show.  Fast moving, clean, and pretty family friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the drive over to see our Variety Show! We're glad you enjoyed it!

name: Jason Taylor
text: He was very personable and engaging with the crowd and I  thought  he did a fantastic job. My favorite part was when he brought the little girl up with the mailbox.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 STARS! The Magic Show is a lot of fun to perform and the mailbox illusion is definitely one of our favorites too. Oh, and the camping tent :)

name: Lace Tuggle
text: AMAZING! This show was soo much fun! Brandon was incredibly down to Earth and often laughed at his jokes. The show has a nice intimate setting. We even sang along and even got chosen as an audience participant. It is definitely a family friendly show and well worth the price! Looking forward to going to his Magic show next!

resp.text: Hi Lace, thank you for leaving a 5-STAR review! We are glad you had soo much fun with us and we look forward to having you back for another show :)

name: Renee Wells
text: Simply put: I had a craving for some good stand-up and Comic Strip Live delivered. This is an excellent, cozy joint to bring a group of friends or a date. And if the people you are with don't like to laugh...well then ditch them and head over yourself. This is the sort of place one would be able to meet new people at.

resp.text: Hi Renee, thank you for the positive review! Did you see the Comedy Magic Show or the 1-Man Variety Show?

name: Janie Masterson
text: I saw the show last night and it was fabulous! I was thoroughly entertained from the beginning to the end. He is a great impressionist, his face even changes and he looks like the person he is impersonating. I loved it. He did ventriloquist while singing and I didn't see his mouth or face move at all!! And the magic was just out of this world. He is the best thing to his south Alabama in 30 years!!! I highly recommend this show for all ages!!!

resp.text: Thank you Janie for the thoughtful review! We are thrilled to live here in South Alabama and grow with OWA. We hope to see you back for the COMEDY MAGIC Show coming soon!

name: Theresa
text: Great show!

resp.text: Hey Theresa, we're glad you had a great time at the show! Thank you for the 5 stars!!

name: Brandon Styles Live
text: I love having my theater and magic shop at OWA!!

name: Karen Hughes
text: Great show! Terrific night out!

resp.text: We appreciate you leaving a 5 star review and so glad you had a terrific night at Brandon Styles Variety Show!

name: The Gaspard Team
text: So much fun! Impersonations, magic, Ventriloquist.. he does it all! His Aaron Neville/ Linda Ronstadt impersonation was amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-stars! The impression/ventriloquism of Aaron Neville/Linda Ronstadt is definitely a highlight. We hope to have you back to another show :)

name: Paul Johnson
text: Brandon styles is a wonderful magical experience. My 12 yo grandson enjoyed it tremendously.

resp.text: Paul, Thank you so much for the 5-stars! I'm glad you had a magical experience! :)

name: Stacey Ryals
text: Very entertaining and great for kids of all ages.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for coming to the Magic Show!

name: Wendy Langham
text: My daughter had her 7th birthday party, then all her friands and family went to  The Magic Show Friday night. It was by far, the best birthday ever!!! Thanks Brandon & family for making my girl's day so special!!  From start to finish by far most entertaining!!  The Interaction with audience my favorite part!  Can t wait till next show.

resp.text: Awe, we're so glad your daughter spent her birthday at our Magic Show! Thank you so much for this amazing review! We'll look forward to seeing you again :)

name: Melissa Stein
text: Fantastically funny show!

resp.text: Thank you! We're glad you loved the show!

name: Belinda Tucker
text: This is so not talked about as much as it should be. Amazing show. Must see all. I am a local and will be a frequent visitor to his shows.

resp.text: Belinda, thank you so much for the amazing review and spreading the word about our shows!

name: Katnisslove13
text: Family friendly, audience participation, and an overall great performance!

resp.text: Thank you so much! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: Claudia Vincent
text: Thoroughly entertaining!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars and I'm so glad you had a great time at Brandon Styles Theater at OWA!

name: Justin Rains
text:
Brandon Styles has a magnetic personality, comedy chops, and a very, very good voice, as well as quality ball-handling skills. His impressions are on point, he is sincere in his delivery and really the dude is just awesome.

Located in Owa, AL, he is building a comedy/musical/impressionist act that deserves to be in Vegas.

Or anywhere closer to my hometown so I can catch his act when I'm not on vacation.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review and your kind words. We hope to see you back when you're on vacation in Gulf Shores, AL! Keep a watch on BrandonStyles.com and social media for tour dates :)

name: Sharon Kersey
text: My five friends and I attended Brandon's Variety Show, and we laughed from beginning to end! His impressions, his magic, his ventriloquism are all spot on and we were thoroughly entertained. After our week long vacation at the beach, we all agreed that Brandon's show was definitely the highlight of our trip!!!

resp.text: Sharon, WOW - we are thrilled and humbled that Brandon Styles Show was the highlight of your vacation! Thank you and your friends for coming!

name: Col Ben Findley
text:
Very good show. Liked the Michael Jackson impression. We'll be back!
Ben

resp.text: Ben, thank you so much for a great review! We look forward to seeing you again :)

name: John Vest
text:
Great show!! Super talented!
We loved the variety of songs.
We will see him again.

resp.text: Thank you for this 5 star review! We are so glad you had a good time with us, we look forward to having you back :)

name: Misty Smith
text: Very entertaining! I would highly recommend seeing this show!

resp.text: Misty, we're glad you had a good time at the show! Thank you for 5-stars and we hope you come back for another show sometime.

name: Michelle Capper
text: Great show!

resp.text: Glad you had a great time! Thank you for the 5 stars

name: Geno Jessmone
text: Good show but I wish their was a little more magic

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving 5 stars! We're glad you enjoyed the Variety Show tonight and if you love magic please come back and see the Magic Show another night! 1 full hour of magic ♥️

name: tricia bankston
text: The performance is always top-notch!

resp.text: Awe!! Thank you so much <3

name: Sherri Galka
text: Totally enjoyed the show and atmosphere!!!

resp.text: Hey Sherri, Thank you so much for for 5 stars! It means a lot to us! We are so glad you enjoyed the show and atmosphere! We work hard to make sure you have a good time so thank you for noticing the little things :)

name: Stephanie Jacobs
text: LOVED this show! Brandon is very professional and excellent at what he does! Please do yourself a favor and take your family and friends to see this show.  I wish I could give more than 5 stars!

resp.text: Stephanie, thank you for "more than 5 stars"! We do our best to put on events you will not forget!

name: Sylvia Neely
text: We enjoyed the show

resp.text: Sylvia, thank you for the 5 stars! I'm glad you enjoyed yourself at Trip Down Memory Lane Dinner Show!!

name: Joni Martin
text: Greatest show along the Gulf Coast! We laughed the entire time and it was so great that it was for the whole family of any age. We will be back again and again!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We're happy to hear you laughed the entire time! We love having you back :)

name: Matthew Wade
text: Perfect part of our vacation!

resp.text: Hey Matt, thank you so much!! We're glad to have been able to add some extra fun to your family vacation! We hope to see you again :)

name: Maxine Casey
text: It was well worth the money...funny and entertaining. I love the interaction with the audience, especially kids!

resp.text: Hi Maxine, thank you for this wonderful review! We are glad to hear you had great experience!

name: Lainey Raynor
text: I would recommend this show as family entertainment. Don't miss the opportunity to see Brandon Styles when you are in there area. Looking forward to seeing a show again!

resp.text: Lainey, thank you for recommending the Variety Show! We're happy you had a good time and want to come back again! Since all of our shows are family friendly, you're going to love the new Comedy Magic Show!

name: Lainey Raynor
text: I would recommend this show as family entertainment. Don't miss the opportunity to see Brandon Styles when you are in there area. Looking forward to seeing a show again!

resp.text: Lainey, thank you for recommending the Variety Show! We're happy you had a good time and want to come back again! Since all of our shows are family friendly, you're going to love the new Comedy Magic Show!

resp.text: Hey Matt, thank you so much!! We're glad to have been able to add some extra fun to your family vacation! We hope to see you again :)

text: My family and I went to see this show over Christmas break! Brandon is an amazing entertainer! It’s nice to have a show the whole family can attend! We will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Marissa, thank you for bringing your family to see the show! We are always happy to hear you will be back. Be sure to see the Comedy Magic Show coming soon!

name: Timothy Lower
text: Had a Great time was lots of Fun!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! So glad you had fun at our Magic Show!

name: Ethan Brown
text: Absolutely the best show ever this guy is amazing he can do 60 impressions absolutely to perfection this guy is so talented it's insane I recommend this show to anyone and everyone who's in town you will want to keep seeing the show if you do it is definitely a once in a lifetime show it's so amazing

resp.text: Wow Ethan, thank you for the awesome review! If you loved the Variety Show, we hope you'll come back to see the COMEDY MAGIC SHOW this summer.

name: Robert Hansel
text: Excellent! He is so talented and funny. His impressions were on point. I highly recommend Brandon and his show

resp.text: Thank you for coming to the show and for leaving 5-STARS! We're so glad you had a good time. Come back and see us anytime!

name: Andrew Anastasia
text: He was great. My wife and I had a wonderful time. We will be going back with the kids next time

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review! Can't wait to have you and your kids back!

name: Lions Royalty
text: I hired Brandon for a party. He was so much fun to watch. We laughed the whole time. Very impressed by his tricks. People of all ages were thoroughly entertained.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing Brandon Styles to your private party!

name: Robin Peters
text: Absolutely add to the list of great family things to do in Baldwin County. Enjoyed the show thoroughly as did every age of my guest from 4 to 60

resp.text: Robin, thank you for the 5 star review! We are happy to hear everyone enjoyed the show. That is our goal! Hope to see you back Spring 2019 for the new Brandon Styles Comedy Magic Show.

text: Awesome show!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming to the Variety Show! We hope you can come back and see the magic show too :)

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5-STAR review. We're glad you had a fun time at the show, thank you for spending your evening with us and we look forward to having you back :)

name: Melanie Foster
text: My husband and I went to the show tonight. Brandon was so funny and his impressions were spot on. I'm bringing more people to his show next time we go. Very much worth every penny.

resp.text: Hi Melanie! Thank you for coming to the show! We are happy to hear you had so much fun and that you want to bring your friends and family back with you. We love offering family friendly entertainment at a price everyone can afford.
